channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why Joe Biden’s Doctor Can’t Legally Refuse To Testify About Biden’s Dementia While President
item.description: Dr. O’Connor cannot cite doctor/patient privilege and medical ethics as reasons why he cannot disclose information about Biden's health.

item.title: Don’t Overlook the Union Factor in California’s Chaos
item.description: The arrest of state SEIU president David Huerta spotlights the intersection of union dollars, Democratic power, and illegal immigration.

item.title: TX Man Arrested After Allegedly Poisoning His Girlfriend, Murdering His Child With Abortion Drug
item.description: Even if the women who take the abortion drug regimen appear physically unscathed, the pills almost always end in death for an unborn baby.

item.title: Uncertainty Is the New Trump Tariff — and Everybody Loses
item.description: This is not a policy regime. It’s coin-flipping with global consequences.

item.title: The West Is Finally Realizing The Ancient Truth That Open Borders Kill Nations
